allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add killer enhancement pipeline with rewrite rules

Components:
- killer_rewrite_rules_v1.yaml: Declarative rules for augmentation
- enhance_killers.py: Deterministic rule application

Actions supported:
- quarantine: Block bad items \(never silently regenerate\)
- regenerate_query: Mark for query regeneration from sense page
- add_minimal_pairs: Generate query variants with cue injection
- flag_for_review: Mark for manual inspection

Features:
- Priority-based rule ordering
- Full audit trail \(original + rule + timestamp\)
- Separate outputs \(enhanced, quarantined, flagged\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tier4 killer exporter for curriculum injection

Extracts hardest failures \(4-5% very negative cases\) as first-class
dataset slice for controlled training injection.

Tier4 criteria:
- Margin < -0.15 \(very wrong\)
- Severity > 1.8 \(high impact\)  
- Rank > 10 \(completely lost\)

Curriculum config:
- Fixed quota per batch \(not random sampling\)
- Higher loss weight \(2x\)
- Shuffle per epoch
- Not drowned by easy majority

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
